metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12482 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OCS Inventory 2.4.1 contains multiple SQL injections in the search engine. Authentication is needed in order to exploit the issues.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocsinventory-reports - 2.5+dfsg-1
ocsinventory-server - 2.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5+dfsg-1').
